title: On the Wind
description: What if one choice—one small gesture—completely changed the lives of so many strangers around you? That's what happens to Felton. He knows Nellie will think the world of his sweet letter, but he doesn't realize that the world will think so much more.  Everything we do, even the slightest thing we do, can have a ripple effect and repercussions that emanate. If you throw a pebble into the water on one side of the ocean, it can create a tidal wave on the other side.Redefining Romance series where you can vote on your favorite characters and stories to become full length novels.
